docs.snippet: Northwestern University football players lost a bid to unionize on Monday when the U.S. National Labor Relations Board dismissed their case, in a setback for elite U.S. student athletes seeking a chunk of the riches generated by college sports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Northwestern University football players lost a bid to unionize on Monday when the U.S. National Labor Relations Board dismissed their case, in a setback for elite U.S. student athletes seeking a chunk of the riches generated by college sports.

headline.main: U.S. Labor Board Dismisses Northwestern Football Players' Union Bid
headline.print_headline: U.S. Labor Board Dismisses Northwestern Football Players' Union Bid

docs.snippet: The National Labor Relations Board on Monday blocked a historic bid by Northwestern University football players to form the nation's first college athletes' union, dealing a blow to a labor movement that could have transformed amateur sports....
docs.lead_paragraph: The National Labor Relations Board on Monday blocked a historic bid by Northwestern University football players to form the nation's first college athletes' union, dealing a blow to a labor movement that could have transformed amateur sports.

headline.main: Labor Board Blocks Effort to Unionize College Athletes
headline.print_headline: Labor Board Blocks Effort to Unionize College Athletes

docs.snippet: Ohio Gov. John Kasich on Monday landed the endorsement of fellow governor Robert Bentley of Alabama, as the presidential hopeful seeks to build support for his White House bid and courts voters in the South....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ohio Gov. John Kasich on Monday landed the endorsement of fellow governor Robert Bentley of Alabama, as the presidential hopeful seeks to build support for his White House bid and courts voters in the South.

headline.main: GOP Hopeful Kasich Files for 1st-In-The-South Primary
headline.print_headline: GOP Hopeful Kasich Files for 1st-In-The-South Primary

docs.snippet: Construction of an NFL stadium in the Los Angeles area could come with another change: a possible shift in division for the Oakland Raiders or the San Diego Chargers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Construction of an NFL stadium in the Los Angeles area could come with another change: a possible shift in division for the Oakland Raiders or the San Diego Chargers.

headline.main: Los Angeles Stadium Could Bring Shift in NFL Divisions
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Stadium Could Bring Shift in NFL Divisions

docs.snippet: The Pirates stayed hot, completing the first season sweep of the Mets in their history, but the Mets’ path to the playoffs is clearer....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Pirates stayed hot, completing the first season sweep of the Mets in their history, but the Mets’ path to the playoffs is clearer.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column observes that New York Mets did not compromise their division lead despite suffering three-game sweep by Pittsburgh Pirates; holds that Mets still have relatively smooth path to postseason in comparison to other National League teams with better records.

headline.main: For Mets, an Inferior Record, and an Enviable Position
headline.print_headline: An Inferior Record, and an Enviable Position

docs.snippet: A soccer club from Gaza was allowed to enter the West Bank for the Palestine Cup final, the first time the competition between the best teams from Gaza and the West Bank had been played in 15 years....
docs.lead_paragraph: A soccer club from Gaza was allowed to enter the West Bank for the Palestine Cup final, the first time the competition between the best teams from Gaza and the West Bank had been played in 15 years.
docs.abstract: Israel eases travel restrictions on Gaza to allow Palestinian soccer team Ittihad Shejaiya to visit West Bank for Palestine Cup final against Ahli al-Khalil soccer club; event marks first time in 15 years that best teams from Palestinian territories Gaza and West Bank have been allowed to compete.

headline.main: Rivalry Is Renewed for Soccer Final in West Bank as Restrictions Are Eased
headline.print_headline: Rivalry Is Renewed for Soccer Final in West Bank as Restrictions Are Eased

byline.contributor: Majd Al Waheidi contributed reporting from Gaza City.
